➤ Jun 2021 - Jul 2022

AIRFORCE1

This web application gives a solution for user manage overview information of an airport. The system have many page with an common UI is a grid excel. The biggest problem of this system is how to adapt the behavior of excel app into web app.

Responsibilities:

● Design technical stack for client side.

● Research technical for system, detect possibility of library.

3

● Design structure of front end source code from the initial.

● Working directly with onsite for detect problems if have any feedback from customer.

● Build common components for reuse.

● Design UI.

● Review and improve UI/UX of web application.

● Deep working with Reactjs/Redux/Spreadjs.

● Review code Junior.

Technologies used in project:

● HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

● React/Redux Sagas.

● Spreadjs.

● Antd.

● Java Spring.

● Hibernate Framework.

● MySQL server.

Achievements:

● Experience in UI/UX design.

● Experience in React/Redux.

● Restful API knowledge.

● Experience in Spreadjs.

● Process build project from initial.

● Co-operate with a large team.
